data.what_is:
Optimove is the first Customer-Led Marketing Platform. Its solutions ensure marketing always starts with the customer instead of a campaign or product. Customer-Led Marketing has been proven to deliver an average of +33% in customer lifetime value. Optimove is the only platform powered by:
1 - Rich historical, real-time, and predictive customer data,
2 - AI-led multichannel journey orchestration, and 
3 - Statistically credible multitouch marketing attribution.

Optimove provides industry-specific solutions for hundreds of leading consumer brands including Staples, SodaStream, Papa John's, BetMGM, Betfred, bet365 and others.
data.product_description: The Optimove CDP autonomously transforms customer data into actionable insights that power thoughtful customer communications, at scale.

plan_features: Set the foundations of your personalized CRM Marketing with Optimove's Build package.
Gain direct access to unified customer data to easily surface valuable insights.
Create powerful, multilayered segments to deliver personalized, campaigns across channels.
Enhance your personalization efforts with an AI-Optimization bot as part of Optimove's Grow package.
Surface valuable engagement opportunities with powerful insight discovery capabilities.
receive marketing optimization recommendations from Optibot.
Increase your CRM personalization by orchestrating highly-segmented, multichannel marketing journeys.
Maximize personalization's impact with AI-mapped CRM journeys as part of Optimove's Scale package.
Gain unlimited access to strategic customer insights to build hyper-segmented customer groups that significantly increase personalization.
Let Optimove's AI map CRM journeys ensure that only the optimal message(s) is sent to each customer, across any channel, every time.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 51 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 49 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 40 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 53 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 43 Optimove reviews. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 51 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 35 Optimove reviews. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 37 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 48 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 36 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 73 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 81 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 75 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 69 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information. This feature was mentioned in 42 Optimove reviews.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 61 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 83 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 64 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 45 Optimove reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 57 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: As reported in 63 Optimove reviews. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 84 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 50 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 53 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 56 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 57 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 65 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 72 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. 50 reviewers of Optimove have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 72 Optimove reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: As reported in 47 Optimove reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores. This feature was mentioned in 38 Optimove reviews.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: As reported in 42 Optimove reviews. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns

features.name: Social Media Engagement

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the most sophisticated CRM orchestration tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
All you need to send meaningful CRM Campaigns in one tool (reporting, segmentation, overviews).
You can find everything you need in the Optimove Academy and video trainings available.
The Optimove Team is great and being able to have a dedicated CSM is a huge plus.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
It can get quite slow when a lot of campaigns are running.
Some sections could you a bit more flexibility in terms of date selection (e.g. customer explorer, so that you are not only able to check data on a 2-week snapshot, but for a particular date/time range)

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove saves incredible amount of time in terms of analysis, from analyzing the data to analyzing campaign performance.
Once implemented, you can easily have hundreds of campaigns running in a completed automated way.

initial_reviews.review_title: The user experience was excellent for me. from creating campaigns to execution them.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
As CRM manager I Optimove was a crucial and essential tool in my daily basis work.  The user experience was excellent. I managed to set up campaigns easily, segment my audience, and get all the data I needed, including the results of my campaigns always on time.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
I love it all. All the features were necessary for me.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending recurring campaigns to a different audience by specific attributes, without doing it manually every time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good AM support, strong segmenting tool with good analytical reporting
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Analysing segments and target groups, reporting and seeing the progress between segment migration. Optimove's main strong sides are the segmenting, micro-segmenting solutions, predictive models (Optibot) and reporting on different levels of the business. AM & customer support is also worth mentioning.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Oldschool look of the product for the past 10+ years. No easy-click drag-n-drop solutions. Making changes in data takes X amount of time. Optimove is an old but totally reliable and working PC (Windows) with menu tree solution and navigating. Many competitors are up to date Mac - drag-n-drop & integrated app solutions with modern look. Both do their work really well, one just looks better. For modern era marketeers its easier to use and learn app based solutions.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automationg all of our marketing communication and analysing results based on performance and predictive models. It helps us understanding our customer behaviour better and adjust accordingly.

initial_reviews.review_title: Data-driven magic, an industry-defining tool for CRM
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Ease of use, streamlining of many CRM tasks, many touchpoints and active participation of our CSM, overall range of functionality, stability & reliability, opportunities to develop content/campaign quality alongside allowing CRM Managers to grow and develop.

Continuous development of features and ever-growing flexibility, interactivity, and analysis capabilities.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Due to covering many industries (and our own limitations), some features and resources are dedicated to actions which we can't take (i.e. we can't actually use some features).

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
More efficient and much better targeted communications, alongside better tracking and significant improvements to analytical capabilities.
The ability to view all marketing content across many dimensions.
One of very few "pure" CRM tools, the Migration Explorer, provides unique insights into a tailored customer lifecycle model.

initial_reviews.review_title: Optimove is improving how we connect with customers.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove is a game-changer for A Sure Win, providing a powerful CRM system that enhances customer engagement. Its innovative features and personalized approach are helping our businesses build lasting relationships with their customers, driving growth and maximizing our ROI. A must-have tool for any betting company looking to stay ahead in a competitive market.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
While Optimove CRM offers many benefits, some users may find the learning curve to be a bit steep. The extensive features and customization options can be overwhelming for beginners, requiring time and effort to fully understand and utilize the platform effectively. However, Optomove gives you a support team that helps with proper training, this initial challenge can be overcome, allowing users to fully leverage the system's capabilities.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove CRM solves the problem of managing and optimizing our customer relationships and marketing efforts. It benefits our business by providing the best data analytics and insights to understand customers better, automating marketing processes for efficiency, and improving customer retention and loyalty through personalized and targeted communication. Overall, Optimove helps us streamline our marketing strategies, enhance customer engagement, and drive long-term growth.

What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove is easy to use, has a great support team which are really skilled talented and friendly. Optimove has been one of the most complex CRM I've had the chance to work with so far. It has a really complex default way to create content for your end users, however it also allow a lot of tailoring for your prefference. My favorite aspect is that I can create my own attribute, just they way I like them

What do you dislike about Optimove?
I think the Dashboard and Mission control can be a little bit more user friendly. Having to manage 3 brands, it would help to have a clear differentiation between each within the reports + a way to see all campaigns from a macro stand point to have an easier way to asses their success (I'm not sure how this would be possible though).

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
the AI feature helps taking our retention efforts to the next level

initial_reviews.review_title: My experience with Optimove has greatly boosted my marketing productivity.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
The Campaign Builder and Mission Control are the most valuable tools in Optimove. With the Campaign Builder, I can create campaigns for different segments with just a few clicks, and it also allows me to utilize multiple channels. Meanwhile, Mission Control makes it effortless to measure and export all running campaigns. In my opinion, these tools significantly enhance productivity.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The new drag and drop Dashboard is not very user-friendly. Perhaps a different type of dashboard with more comprehensive reports would be highly useful.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Its robust tools help in segmenting and targeting customers effectively, automating marketing campaigns, and optimizing customer experiences. This benefits me by streamlining my marketing/crm efforts, enhancing customer satisfaction.

initial_reviews.review_title: Optimove makes planning, setting up and analysing multi-channel campaigns a breeze!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove has all of the necessary features for setting up ultra-personalised multi-channel marketing campaigns. The Target Group builder and customer segmentation attributes are invaluable. I love the wide variety of KPIs and dashboards available for analysing campaigns and customer behaviour from every angle possible. Our Customer Success Manager is also always on hand to speedily answer any questions we have!

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Some pages can sometimes take a while to load if you have many campaigns running/a lot of data. Resolving bugs or data errors can also  sometimes be time-consuming.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove allows us to automate most of our campaign processes, saving us a lot of time-consuming work. The many data dashboards available also make campaign and customer journey analysis a breeze, they help to provide a clearer picture of our customers and how our campaigns are doing.

It's also extremely helpful that we are able to integrate other tools with Optimove, such as our push tool, so that we are able to plan and schedule everything through Optimove. Lastly, Optimove has an exceptional customer service team. They respond to issues in a timely matter and ensure that they communicate status updates to you as their working through different issues.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The one thing that could use some improvement is ensuring that the data is updated in a timely matter each day. There have been a few different periods of time where the Daily Process would constantly update very late in the day and it interered with our comms schedule.

initial_reviews.review_title: Exceptional personalization and professional Customer Support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove is a top-notch marketing automation service that has far exceeded my expectations. The feature that has truly impressed me is its ability to provide a high level of personalization in our marketing campaigns. Thanks to the detailed analysis of the Customer Base, Optimove has allowed us to create highly specific segments and tailor our communications and promotions more effectively, significantly improving the overall effectiveness of our campaigns.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Although I am truly satisfied with the service provided by Optimove, initially, coming from another marketing automation system, I found the interface a bit complex to use. However, the support team and CMS Ilaria (formerly Ines) have always been available. The customer support has been truly professional and efficient, and I am grateful to have a dedicated team that responds promptly to my questions and any technical support requests.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove has been the perfect solution to address our marketing challenges and has provided us with remarkable results. In the past, understanding our customers' behavior and consequently personalizing our campaigns were much more laborious. Thanks to the implementation of Optimove, we have achieved advanced segmentation, offering more relevant content and offers to each customer group. This has significantly improved our retention strategy, reducing churn, and increasing the lifetime value of our customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best part of Optimove is their approach to customer service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
CDPs (Customer Data Platforms) are extremely complicated pieces of software. Optimove has a long road of improvements behind it, over the 8 years I have been using it. One thing is simply being on the receiving end of the updates, but it is wholly another experience being actively involved in the feedback and evolution of the product! This is where Optimove has put a lot of effort in with their customer serive ans customer sucess managers - and really is unparalleled amongst the suites of software I'm using for my work. Proper CS care is expensive, and I am sad to see a lot of companies moving away from human communication in favor of chatbots and other nonsense, which merely are automated forms of FAQs (and that drives me nuts when you need real help from a real person in the know). Please keep your approach to CS - it is the longer road, but definitely the right thing to do!

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The initial learning curve can be daunting, especially building your instance around your data, but Optimove's data team are really top guns here, so everything will be sorted! As with every huge cloud based software suite, there are downtimes and timeouts, but these most likely are external infrastructure issues and have always been promplty solved. Top job, nothing to complain about, really!

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove provides me with all the segmentation and targeting needs, as well as automating routine daily tasks. It is the heart of our B2C communication and one of the most versatile we have seen. After 8 years of usage there are still features and options we are yet to discover! New ones are being baked as we speak!

all_reviews.review_title: Good AM support, strong segmenting tool with good analytical reporting
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Analysing segments and target groups, reporting and seeing the progress between segment migration. Optimove's main strong sides are the segmenting, micro-segmenting solutions, predictive models (Optibot) and reporting on different levels of the business. AM & customer support is also worth mentioning.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Oldschool look of the product for the past 10+ years. No easy-click drag-n-drop solutions. Making changes in data takes X amount of time. Optimove is an old but totally reliable and working PC (Windows) with menu tree solution and navigating. Many competitors are up to date Mac - drag-n-drop & integrated app solutions with modern look. Both do their work really well, one just looks better. For modern era marketeers its easier to use and learn app based solutions.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automationg all of our marketing communication and analysing results based on performance and predictive models. It helps us understanding our customer behaviour better and adjust accordingly.

In the past, understanding our customers' behavior and consequently personalizing our campaigns were much more laborious. Thanks to the implementation of Optimove, we have achieved advanced segmentation, offering more relevant content and offers to each customer group. This has significantly improved our retention strategy, reducing churn, and increasing the lifetime value of our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: The best part of Optimove is their approach to customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
CDPs (Customer Data Platforms) are extremely complicated pieces of software. Optimove has a long road of improvements behind it, over the 8 years I have been using it. One thing is simply being on the receiving end of the updates, but it is wholly another experience being actively involved in the feedback and evolution of the product! This is where Optimove has put a lot of effort in with their customer serive ans customer sucess managers - and really is unparalleled amongst the suites of software I'm using for my work. Proper CS care is expensive, and I am sad to see a lot of companies moving away from human communication in favor of chatbots and other nonsense, which merely are automated forms of FAQs (and that drives me nuts when you need real help from a real person in the know). Please keep your approach to CS - it is the longer road, but definitely the right thing to do!

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The initial learning curve can be daunting, especially building your instance around your data, but Optimove's data team are really top guns here, so everything will be sorted! As with every huge cloud based software suite, there are downtimes and timeouts, but these most likely are external infrastructure issues and have always been promplty solved. Top job, nothing to complain about, really!

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove provides me with all the segmentation and targeting needs, as well as automating routine daily tasks. It is the heart of our B2C communication and one of the most versatile we have seen. After 8 years of usage there are still features and options we are yet to discover! New ones are being baked as we speak!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Optimove?
review_question_answers.answer: CDPs (Customer Data Platforms) are extremely complicated pieces of software. Optimove has a long road of improvements behind it, over the 8 years I have been using it. One thing is simply being on the receiving end of the updates, but it is wholly another experience being actively involved in the feedback and evolution of the product! This is where Optimove has put a lot of effort in with their customer serive ans customer sucess managers - and really is unparalleled amongst the suites of software I'm using for my work. Proper CS care is expensive, and I am sad to see a lot of companies moving away from human communication in favor of chatbots and other nonsense, which merely are automated forms of FAQs (and that drives me nuts when you need real help from a real person in the know). Please keep your approach to CS - it is the longer road, but definitely the right thing to do!

all_reviews.review_title: Overall okay, but experience toward the end was full of glitches
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Marketing calendar - but then they took it away from us. We enjoyed being able see all the campaigns we scheduled out in an easy-to-view manner. The new view was touted to be something amazing and that would essentially be able to provide us that same experience if we modified it with filters. And in theory, it could, but it was never quite the same and I often experienced glitches in statuses of campaigns in that new campaign view.

Note: Trisha was an amazing point-of-contact for us and is much appreciated

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Toward the end of our time with Optimove is when things started to break down more frequently and I think that's when communication probably did so as well. For example, during our 2022 Thanksgiving campaign, a key campaign, something happened where campaigns didn't launch as they should've. And that was not something on our end with the set-up of the campaign - it was a glitch within their system where we had to scramble to re-run certain campaigns.

It would be one thing if that was a one-time thing, but things like that happened all the time. We'd schedule campaigns and wonder what was going to go wrong on the launch date.

We'd always hear differing things and it seemed like Optimove's tech was always confused by what was happening to our campaigns. The customer support also wasn't the best there (nothing like Bloomreach/Exponea where we are at now).

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
As noted in the previous question, we often had campaign glitches with little help from support. When our team would contact their support team, it would take forever and they often seemed unapologetic for the stress caused to our team.

all_reviews.review_title: Cornerstone of Marketing - Optimove
all_reviews.review_content:

Accountability, insightful data, easy usage, visual representation of data, easy to understand features, clearly defined certification programme to ensure yearly knowledge review (and supporting documentation in Optimove Academy)

What do you dislike about Optimove?
I don't see downsides per se, having said that I am not an in-depth user. From what I hear from Optimove users, generically speaking users are happy with the tool.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing is all about laser focused targeting and Optimove helps us to achieve that. It works seamlessly with our internal tools which is a massive benefit. Overall, it helps us to spend money on rewards for the right people at the right time/channel.

all_reviews.review_title: One solution to rule CRM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove holds a complete solution for any company looking for a complete CRM + BI analytics for its business. It's easy to use and to understand and the amount of data you can bring from your marketing strategies is stunning.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
I think the only thing I dislike is the daily process. Don't get me wrong, I understand the reason why it's there but I think that the data should be taken in batches now and then during the day rather once a day.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Nowadays medium size and big companies are storing a tremendous amount of data from their customers. This is obviously a problem in terms of marketing when the CRM teams need to decide how to segment this data. I think Optimove is helping companies find an easy way to build these segments and also about creating different strategies to target them with the correct reward at the correct moment. Apart from that, if your CRM teams are using in a good way the tools included in Optimove, you will be able to see realistic reports from your campaigns. This is helping our business to find better strategies, also about how to be more granular in terms of segmentation and giving us the ability to react at the exact moment to the necessities of our company.

Apart from that, if your CRM teams are using in a good way the tools included in Optimove, you will be able to see realistic reports from your campaigns. This is helping our business to find better strategies, also about how to be more granular in terms of segmentation and giving us the ability to react at the exact moment to the necessities of our company.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to learn and work with
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
How flexible the tool is, it's very rarely that i need any information about our campaigns or their results where i need to use another system, Optimove holds the relevant info on both deliverability of campaigns and their profitability so straight after a campaign has finished its run we can head to the analytics page and see how the KPIs performed.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Not able to lock optimail templates to be uneditable, it's too easy for coordinators to accidentally save and overwrite "master templates". Wish there was a way to update existing templates when we make changes to the "master templates". When we have to do major updates such as changing the license number in the footer we need to manually update each campaign that uses that template, would be sweet if Optimove could do the changes to the affected area also in old templates built from the same "Master templates".

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Biggest benefit compared to previous ESP is definitely around reporting and how much of the campaign analyzis is handled by Optimove. Used to have to go to Tableau and other tools to see campaign uptake etc but in Optimove it's all within a few clicks of the campaign planner.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimove puts great analytics tools and consolidated customer data at your fingertips
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
We are totally rethinking how we run campaigns and how we measure success. We have a new set of KPIs that make much more sense for our customer base and help us make more intelligent decisions in marketing and across the organization. Optimove has given us insights into our customers we've never been able to see before.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Generally, I have only positive things to say. The tool takes some getting used to at first (locating certain reports etc.) but is mostly very user-friendly. I would like to be able to integrate more marketing channels more seamlessly, but we've had success with email, SMS and paid social.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have so much data at our fingertips and no longer need to write long SQL queries to extract data for basic analysis. Given the new views and access to our customer data, we're also forced to challenge internal assumptions we've long held about our customers.

We have a much greater ability to speak to our site visitors, leads and customers through 1:1 messaging. We've been using the tool for <6 months and are already miles ahead of where we were pre-Optimove in terms of segmentation and targeting. I also personally love working with the customer support and professional services teams--they provide so much insight and really help expand what our small marketing team can do.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimove aging better than wine!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
It's probably the complete CRM tool in the market if we analyze the whole package.
It's very versatile in terms of segmentation/targeting customization. It's easy to set up campaigns uni or multi-channel.
The tool offers dashboards with sufficient KPIs for instant performance tracking and campaign improvement suggestions with unquestionable reliability
It's an intuitive tool to use from basic to advanced level, with a lot of room to be creative due to the flexibility of criteria that can be integrated into the platform.
The support service is excellent, as they are very cooperative and keen on our feedback as users to improve Optimove and our experience.
It does get better every year.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The journey planner feature could be better optimized.
(allowing performing changes to it at any given time after implementation)
Reporting customization could be more flexible and less dependant on development/feature requests.
A pause and resume option for stand-alone or recurring campaigns would be a plus.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
A complete CRM tool that provides enough insights/reporting to know your macro marketing and business performance.
Easy to utilize. It's reliable and keeps getting upgraded.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Different ways of avoiding the overlap of lifecycles through creative attributes criteria and not just the "excluded from other campaigns" option.

Adding relevant attributes that were not previously contemplated.

We have never regretted beginning our partnership with Optimove and look forward to our future collaboration and mutual success.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimove review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
We have been using Optimove for  4 years now for our CRM & Marketing, and it's going great!

What I like about Optimove is that it is easy to learn and very in-depth reporting everything we need is in there, and if it's not, they are always willing to help and find a solution.

- Great Support
- Deep analysis
- Mission control
- Customer 360
- Funnel Explorer
- Dashboard overview

What do you dislike about Optimove?
I miss a pause button once a campaign is running, and if I would like to pause a cycle to update it or change something, it's a bit of work to get it sorted.
Other than that, it's a bit slow at times.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
I would definitely consider Optimove as your next CRM tool.
The level of support and the ease of use is amazing.
They go above and beyond for you and your company needs.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Optimove for our CRM Life cycles and Analytics.
We also use Optimove for all our Weekly marketing campaigns.

We schedule all our Sms, Email, Push, Inbox through Mission control.

We are gaining more NDPs and returning customers and more in-depth details about our business finance.

all_reviews.review_title: The best marketing platform for automations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
User-friendly software offering huge potential for sophisticated campaign automations. The core of the segmentation model is the Lifecycle segmentation which forms a solid base upon which more granular groups can be created using the various attributes available through the platform. Perfect for medium to larger organisations. Works seamlessly with a number of email and SMS providers. Excellent customer support and proactive assistance from the Account Managers. Great dashboards and reporting capabilities and a lot of insight gained through the platform's Segmentation Explorer.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The Journey creator can be improved with the introduction of a lifelong control group, to allow the cross comparison between different journeys. Also, insights gained through Optibot's recommendations can be further improved to become more tailored to Gaming or Retail, depending in which industry the operator belongs to.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
Go for it! I totally recommend it! It will only improve your processes!

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have stopped using lists for sendouts. Downloading lists and then importing them in the email platform can be extremely time consuming and it can increase the likelyhood of human error. With Optimove we were able to set up various automated and highly personalised campaigns and customer journeys, recurring daily, weekly or monthly. In addition, Optimove has a great customer data section which can be used to explore different segmentation options, compare groups or check customer migrations between the various lifecycle segments at a certain moment in time. All customer attributes available in the system are exportable, which comes in very handy in cases where we need bespoke reports.

all_reviews.review_title: Why Optimove is awesome CRM tool?
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove is a perfect tool for gambling companies. Why? Few factors:

(Technicaly)
Any integrations are effortless and well described, even these with your internal tools. You can adjust it to your needs, clients, or just for your comfort. New ideas are often implemented, Optimove team are doing their best to make their customers life easier and take in considerations customers need (it's not so popular unfortunatlly).

(CRM)
In the case of attributions, segmentations - well, anything is possible. It's a powerfull tool that gives a lot of possibilites and shows all data in really transparent way. Also they adjust whole platform for you customer model, what makes CRM work better. In my company Optimove become the hear of any work with client - marketing strategy are based on this tool capabilities.

(Working with Optimove's employees)
To be honest - I've never been left without answer, even if questions was not so smart. Customer Service is really quick. Customer Success Managers are like you friend - guieding you through any new stuff (or old if you forget how to use it). Good advice, calls full of knowledge.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
No Real-Time clients data update is a flaw. Also, sometimes it takes a long time to implement some changes from Optimove side - their BI team is extremly busy I guess. Like with any other tools - bugs happend, mistakes happend.

Anyhow - I would recomend it to any company.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove is a timesaver! Our company is in the process of maximum marketing automatization and Optimove, especially Track&Trigger, makes campaigns previously "made by hand" fully executed "in the background" with no people help.

all_reviews.review_title: Great segmentation tool: personalised offers bring better conversions.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove is a great segmentation tool, which we use to plan, execute, measure and optimise our marketing activities. It uses a very clever algorithm of segmenting customers based on their behaviour, which allows us to send the right offer to the right group of customers, increasing the pick-up rate.

Optimove provides easy to read and transparent analytics, which allow us to check the performance of each campaign separately as well as compare target groups and and analyse customers' migration.

Our account managers are always helpful, they systematically provide team training and assist us in resolving issues.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
You can't delete an action if you have used it once. We end up having a huge list of actions which are no longer used, but take up the space.
It auto-archives unused target groups, however we often need to reuse them again, and it creates issues finding them in the archive folder and move them back to the active folder.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
Optimove is great for automated streams as well as one-off campaigns, the set up is quite straight forward and the result in KPI's is visible relatively soon.
With the proper integration and training from Optimove you will be able to craft your marketing strategy and enjoy the outcome.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Through Optimove we run our personalised campaigns targeted to customers with different product preference and behaviour. Thanks to Optimove we are able to recognise the differences between each customer segment and find the right offer for each of them, which in return increases our ROI and significantly decreases churn rates.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimove allows us to get Campaigns live faster while investing less internal resources to do so!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove enables us to grow our retention and monetisation activities while allowing us to save on development costs. Before we adopted Optimove, our developers would need to configure promotions every time we wanted to run them, but now with Optimove and it's in-app inbox channel, we can configure templates once  and easily rerun them with little more than a push of a button. Not only that, its Marketing Plan is incredibly useful to get an overview of all our activities and schedule new campaigns and its Target Group creation tool is the best I've ever used.

Optimove also has an amazing support team and a CSM that's always available to answer our queries and find solutions to any problem or need we may encounter.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Real Time Campaigns could be improved if they provided the option to include users already locked in higher priority campaigns in further campaigns. Other than that, the product is great and it's becoming better with every new update.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are reducing the effort and the time required from our teams to set Campaigns to go live. Without Optimove, we'd need developers to set certain campaigns live every time we wanted to run them, but now we can easily schedule those campaigns and reruns ourselves.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimove Review | Marketing Automation & Personalization
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
With Optimove you can automatically target different segments and prevent clients from migrating into the churn Lifecycle Stage. All your database is assigned to a specific segment based on personalized betting activity/pattern which greatly helps us target customers as accurately as possible. There's even a bot, OptiBot, which suggests an action/campaign if you missed anything.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Like any tool, there is always room for improvement. I would like Optimove to have real-time data updates and the possibility to assign a different promotion code while using multiple templates. Moreover, having a roll-back functionality would be helpful in cases where things do not go as intended. Nonetheless, Optimove always takes into consideration the client's opinion and I'm sure they'll improve in this regard.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
If you are looking for a CRM tool and you are in the gambling industry, then go for it. Most, if not all of your needs will be covered by Optimove.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove has improved our churn rate and conversion of new clients to actual depositors through their advanced lifecycle stages. The clients are segmented through advanced calculations and the communications are sent to the right customers at the ideal time.

all_reviews.review_title: 1 Year Experience on Optimove's CRM tool
all_reviews.review_content:

The ability to microsegment, easily extracting data and setting up personalized campaigns to meet customer's behavior/pattern. After a campaign has finished running, we have to option to evaluate it in order to find area for improvement.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Data is not updated in real-time, thus not allowing us to create instant campaigns/rewards or triggers. In case of a unplanned downtime, there is no backup server in order to allow us to continue/run our daily campaigns.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
Optimove is a great CRM tool for the gambling industry.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimoved helped me to extract data that in seconds that previously we had to ask it internally from the BI department. It improved customer loyalty and churn prevention with its sophisticated churn factor mechanism. Now we have automated customer journey & scheduled campaigns and segmentation of our entire database.

all_reviews.review_title: Great for customer intelligence and automation, but not quite a cohesive solution yet.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Our team uses tools such as the Customer Explorer, Segmentation Explorer, and Cohort Analysis to identify cohorts of interest and then build relevant journeys. We really like Streams and have used it to test things such as different onboarding experiences. We also make use of the Facebook Integration for lookalike modeling.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
We use Track and Trigger for popups quite a bit, but feel the reporting could be improved.

Currently, we feel the prioritization is too limiting, especially when you have multiple business stakeholders coordinating different campaigns across different lifecycle stages. The SOJ should help solve this problem. Moreover, Optibot doesn't always optimize for KPIs relevant to our business or specific cohorts. It would be great to add more flexibility here.

I expressed this in my pre-CAB survey, but Optimove still feels like a series of fragmented solutions instead of one cohesive tool. It would be great to have the same or at least the vast majority of the same set of attributes and filters across different dashboards in the tool. For example, everything that's available in the CE is not always available or applicable in the SE or Cohort Analysis views.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
Make sure your business is ready from a data cleanliness, availability, and integration standpoint.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
For us, data democratization as well as cross channel journey building and testing has always been a challenge. We weren't enabled to do it quickly and easily with our current marketing stack, but Optimove helped us quickly make immense amounts of actionable data available to our strategy team to solve real business problems related to LTV, churn, and personalization.

all_reviews.review_title: User friendly access to the customer data
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
As written above, to me, one of the most pleasant surprises was user-friendliness of Optimove.
To my mind, the main pros of this product is the absence of delays during marketing planning as there is no need to wait for data from BI analysts. Each tool is in your hands.
Next strong pros are an efficient way to analyze the impact and execution details of the marketing campaigns/convenient access to the target groups details.
To sum this all up the most key features are:

Funnel explorer (conversion rate/insight on newcomers)
Optibot (pretty handy suggestions)
Customer model (know your customer)
Segmentation explorer (know behaviour of your customer)
Journey builder (convenient, drag and drop design)
Marketing plan (keep your hand on the pulse of the execution of your campaigns)
Customer explorer (track your desired target group for a corresponding promo)

What do you dislike about Optimove?
To be honest there is nothing much to dislike.
Of course like in every IT product there may be bugs and issues. However, they are not critical plus optimove guys are doing their best to solve them.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
At first sight, optimove might be a bit complicated but I recommend to put your efforts into it.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer data analytics
Planning of the customer journeys
Customer retention
Execution of the campaigns
Marketing analytics

all_reviews.review_title: From Managing Actions and Target Groups to Marketing Plan and From Evaluations to Analysis.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
I like the simplicity of the entire process of setting up a campaign or running a whole marketing plan until the easy way to evaluate our campaigns or/and explore, learn, get insights through extra analytics.
At positives how your high skilled, experienced personnel responds to our potential issues and the way they are trying to improve our goals. Also, the workshops you organize in order to get the total impact of the available tools in Optimove.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
When we deep dive, in order to target a small but perfect group for a campaign, we need to select several criteria, keeping in mind the complex selection of those criteria as well as the priority of the group in order to achieve it. We have noticed an improvement but we need an upgrade in this field. Also, we need to go forward to real time campaigns (at the time data refresh is once per day). Also, it will be really hard to update (with extra or/and different parameters) a running model in Optimove.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
The easy, to the point and quick way of targeting our customers,  time saving on setting up a campaign, almost immediate evaluation, potential insights to improve target groups or/and communication channels. At positives the recurrence of the whole process. All the above help us to give the correct offers to correct customers' segments and improve our budget and increase our objective measures.

It is very user friendly platform that allows marketers to quickly create campaigns and monitor their performance.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
When you serve more than one brands or countries via one Optimove instance, it is not possible to filter all the views/ analysis per brand or country. Filters have been applied to Customer model and other important areas but when it is applied across the board, it will be fantastic.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
Optimove allows marketing teams to run automated campaigns that would not be feasible to manage without it. By always using a control group, Optimove helps us understand if campaigns actually shift customer behavior and meet the set KPI. The CRM teams need to be committed to monitor the performance of the campaigns and make changes when required.
It allows to test the effectiveness of the various communication channels.

all_reviews.review_title: Optimove gives a 360 view of customers and continually moves them forward.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
The Customer Model is really the starting point of what makes Optimove great. It provides a clear picture of where your customers are currently so you know what direction to push them into. From there, the Segmentation Layers break down our customers automatically into marketable buckets. The Future Value attribute then helps us determine which customers are more important to retain.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
Optimove has so many bells and whistles, you really need a person who can dedicate at least 50% of their time to maintaining Optimove, sending and analyzing campaigns. I don't recomend it for a small company without a lot of time to dedicate to it.

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
If you really want to see your customer behavior, Optimove if for you. It doesn't just store your customer data, it interprets it into a way that is super useful to market to.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
We (like many businesses) have a problem with people being one time customers then never returning. We've set up reoccurring churn campaigns that have helped tremendously. We no longer have to pull lists of people who are dormant and send them an offer that may or may not be relevant, then pull that list of customer activity after the offer to see if it was effective. With our churn campaign, we're sending relevant offers based on previous activity, we are hitting customers at the right time, and we can immediately see the impact. It's a wonderful thing to take to an executive meeting as concrete evidence of what we are doing to retain customers.

all_reviews.review_title: useful tool to work with
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
I really like the way of working with Optimove as a tool, it is very intuitive and user friendly.

On the other hand, I believe is a good tool but when you are a level with a high understanding of Marketing or CRM, you are missing some things that are key in order to work.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
From my view it is limiting my role the following:

- 24 hours delay, not real time.
- Priority list, not possible at the moment to prioritize based on communications channel. Impossible to have an overview of how the target groups and priorities are structured when many people work on the same instance.
- The analysis part is very limited and not giving a certain analysis i.e. we can't attribute the success of a campaign just based on the response rate, this needs to match the reward data (claim rate, usage rate of certain bonus etc.
- Duration of the campaigns i.e. FCA if you set up the campaign for a day (because you don't want these customers to be excluded the day after from other campaigns i.e. Email) the day after this audience dispersal in Facebook side so we lose all the effectiveness.
-

Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
I believe that Optimove is a really good tool for a basic CRM approach, however when you want to go to a high level of segmentation or Marketing and you need to have an overall idea of what's going on in a granular level (multichannel strategy, communications per customer and value of from it...) it it is a bit limited.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
From my understanding at the moment, we are pretty much using Optimove for segmentation and for pushing campaigns out to the customers.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Optimove?
review_question_answers.answer:
From my view it is limiting my role the following:

- 24 hours delay, not real time.
- Priority list, not possible at the moment to prioritize based on communications channel. Impossible to have an overview of how the target groups and priorities are structured when many people work on the same instance.
- The analysis part is very limited and not giving a certain analysis i.e. we can't attribute the success of a campaign just based on the response rate, this needs to match the reward data (claim rate, usage rate of certain bonus etc.
- Duration of the campaigns i.e. FCA if you set up the campaign for a day (because you don't want these customers to be excluded the day after from other campaigns i.e. Email) the day after this audience dispersal in Facebook side so we lose all the effectiveness.
-

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Optimove:
review_question_answers.answer: I believe that Optimove is a really good tool for a basic CRM approach, however when you want to go to a high level of segmentation or Marketing and you need to have an overall idea of what's going on in a granular level (multichannel strategy, communications per customer and value of from it...) it it is a bit limited.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: From my understanding at the moment, we are pretty much using Optimove for segmentation and for pushing campaigns out to the customers.

all_reviews.review_title: EXCELLENT SERVICE
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
Optimove is a privately held company that develops and markets a software as a service software product, also called Optimove, for the automation of personalized customer retention marketing.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
The marketing channels supported by Optimove include email, SMS, mobile push notification, website/app pop-ups, Facebook Custom Audiences and Google Ads.


What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
The software is based on a combination of technologies, including predictive customer modeling, customer micro-segmentation, multi-channel campaign automation, real-time campaign triggers, and systematic campaign optimization using scientific control methodologies. The application's primary interface is a calendar-based marketing management tool that helps users track and optimize campaigns. Campaigns are analyzed as measurable marketing experiments so that users can determine the financial uplift that each marketing campaign generated.

Since the world of Optimove and the wast wastelands of date take up so much server power, it's hard to operate live what would be perfect.

all_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive tool to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Optimove?
The customer model allows you to plan and structure the correct path for them in detail. I find the future value attribute one of the more useful tools to project estimates and cut losses.

What do you dislike about Optimove?
It was a bit hard to navigate around since there are so many metrics to explore in the beginning.

What problems is Optimove solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps with the issue of clients that dont return. Setting up a campaign eliminates time used to reach out to nonactive clients or those that have left.
